A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Last Jedi is a spectacle which hasn't been since the The Empire Strikes Back. I understand there is a lot of mix reviews regarding it's plot. I also understand how near-impossible it is to please all the Star Wars Fanbase. Rian does a terrific job here and takes risks with the franchise unlike J.J. who just rehashes a New Hope with Force Awakens. I myself would've liked to see more Dark Side influence in the movie\, but it's the story of the Resistance and their place in the galaxy. Overall\, I give Last Jedi a solid 4 and a half stars. It's not perfect but it's also not what a lot of salty people have marked it up as either. 

Things I would've liked to have seen: 

More Phasma influence. For such a bad-ass as she's portrayed as in the most recent book\, she left much to be desired for as a character in this particular movie. 

A more deep-dive into who or what Snoke is. 

Overall\, I recommend this film as a must-see for any Star Wars Fan.
